title: Option from menu bar do not operate for connection in separate windows.
author: Wolvverine
body_snippet:
When unfastening the tab with RDP connection to the local HV machine as a separate window, the options (reconect,disconect,fullscreen,...) do not work.

## Expected Behavior
The mentioned options will operate normally.

## Current Behavior
Nothing is happening

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Open the connection in the tab.
2. Move the connection to a separate standalone window (Outside the panel)
3. Select options from under the right button on the bar.

* ...
